attributes.review: if i am being honest, this app was TERRIBLE. HORRIBLE!!!! the worst thing i have encountered in 2020 😡. i have encountered murder hornets😥, covid-19😷, was kidnapped and tortured in a remote russian facility 😱, battled satan himself👹, had all of my toes cut off by a homeless man😫, had my nose broken by a kangaroo😞, had my knee caps removed by a bone eating tarantula, and THEN this app came along😫😞👎🏽😭😓😪🤮🤧. it has broken me! as soon as i downloaded it a bomb labeled “trump 2020 4eva🙈🙈🙈🙈” was dropped on my house, trump showed up at my new house and took all of the food, locked us in there, and now we are going on 4 months without FOOD or WATER 😔😔. THEN the app proceeded to morph my phone into a pathway for the multiverse in which it was used as a portal to let thousands of miniature versions of donald roam through my house, biting us and licking us while we tried to fight them off 😰. they kept screaming “give us a small loan of a million dollars and we’ll leave you alone 🤬🤬🤬!!!” I am not sure what to do but DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. as i type this i have miniature donalds asking me where melania is with their daily intake of 15 pounds cheeto puffs🙄. PLS LISTEN TO ME, I BEG OF YOU!!! this is worse than the russian torture facility 😣😣😣!!! IF I COULD GIVE THIS APP ZERO STARS I WOULD 😤😤😤!!!!
attributes.title: Worst App EVER!

attributes.review: So I heard Trump had a app from TikTok so I downloaded just to piss of the fat Cheeto for revenge for taking TikTok away..... 💝💚💓❤️LOVE TIKTOK FAM

attributes.title: To TRUMP

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app.
And, it was spreading false information.
My god, it was awful. 
For goodness sake, remove this app.
Really disappointed in the president. 
Obviously he’ trying to misinform the people. 
Manipulating the citizens of the country
To use them for his political career. 
Insisting immigration will lead to
Killing and crime. 
This fall will define
Our country. 
Kiss my ass. 
(Pay attention to the caps)
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I ALMOST CRIED IT WAS SO SCARY SEEING THIS UGLY THING ON MY SCREEN AND MY SCREEN ALMOST BROKE FROM IT PLEASE DELETE THIS APP APPLE ITS HORRIBLE AND ALSO DELETE FOR ANDROID USERS TOO ITS HORRIBLE DISGUSTING AND EWW 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 ON A GRAVESTONE

attributes.review: I opened the app, I see a picture of Steve buschemi chowing down one scooby Doo’s ass. I was pretty okay with it at first because you know, people like what they like. But my disgust continued when I realized I was on the Trump 2020 campaign app instead of Wattpad. I’ve never been more disappointed in my life 👁👄👁
attributes.title: Naked Winnie the Pooh

attributes.review: I opened the app and it had the worst thing in the world. i saw a horrific picture of mr. cheeto man getting a spray tan. And to make matters worse there were non stop photos of this man. Luckily we all had protection to keep us from getting the cheeto virus from this man.
attributes.title: i hate mr.cheeto🧚✨
